A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw Last Jedi last night and I may need to see it again to give a full opinion but as for my initial thoughts. It was good not great but good. It had some elements I loved and some that I questioned\, but I think the parts that I questioned helped expand on the Star Wars universe. There is a few story choices though that fell flat and that's a problem I have but I think that this will fall in the middle of the list in my rankings . I still really like Rogue One and Empire more but I like what Last Jedi adds to the universe.
